channel.title: Prob with taois aryan
channel.description: i get this error wen i load any script Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.IllegalAccessError: tried to access fie ld Entity.anim from class PowerChopper at PowerChopper.runChop(PowerChopper.java:124) at PowerChopper.run(PowerChopper.java:69) at AbstractManager.run(AbstractManager.java:55) at ScriptManager.processScripts(ScriptManager.java:50) at Bot.notifyScripting(Bot.java:743) at Bot.postGameLoop(Bot.java:699) at client.method9(client.java:5280) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:123) at client.run(client.java:2061) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ----- any help?

item.title: Prob with taois aryan
item.dc:creator: @Spiraster Spiraster
item.description:
@Spiraster wrote:

Yes it does.

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.IllegalAccessError: tried to access field Entity.anim from class PowerChopper

Or take a closer look at

field Entity.anim

PowerChopper is trying to access the anim variable in Entity.java, which it doesnt have access to. So obviously making it public gives PowerChopper access and gets rid of the error. I’m not just pulling this off the top of my head. This is how I fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Prob with taois aryan
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd

item.title: Prob with taois aryan
item.dc:creator: @Spiraster Spiraster
item.description:
@Spiraster wrote:

It IS a problem with aryan. Go into your output folder, open Entity.java, find int anim at the bottom and make it public.

Read full topic
